name: Child of the North Wind
text: You are part of a tradition that considers the north wind to be your spiritual parent, and you revere the spirits that first breathed life into the world. Members of your tradition can be found wherever the north wind blows.

features.northWindAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also gain a benefit until the end of your next turn: When you hit any enemy, you either deal 5 extra damage to that enemy or knock it prone
features.northWindVortex(11thLevel): When you reduce any enemy to 0 hit points, you slide each enemy marked by you 1 square as a free action
features.staggeringCritical(16thLevel): When you score a critical hit with a melee attack, each enemy marked by you is knocked prone

flavorText: My weapon strikes with the north wind’s savage bite. You aren’t mighty enough to stand against it.
